Module org.example.miniproyecto_3
Package org.example.miniproyecto_3.View.Assets

Class ShapeDrawer

java.lang.Object
org.example.miniproyecto_3.View.Assets.ShapeDrawer
public class ShapeDrawer extends Object
Provides methods to draw 2D shapes used to represent hits and misses on the board in the Battleship game.

This class creates graphical shapes such as markers for hit cells on ships or miss indicators on water cells using JavaFX shapes.

  • Method Details

    • drawX

      public Group drawX()
      Draws an "X" shape composed of two red crossed lines.

      This shape is used to mark a missed shot on an empty Cell.

      Returns:
      a Group containing two Line objects forming a red "X" with rounded line caps and beveled line joins.

    • createPolygon

      private Polygon createPolygon(String fillColor, String strokeColor, double layoutX, double layoutY, double... points)
      Creates a Polygon with specified fill and stroke colors, position, and points.
      Parameters:
      fillColor - the fill color in web format (e.g., "#ff0000")
      strokeColor - the stroke color in web format (e.g., "#000000")
      layoutX - the x-coordinate position of the polygon layout
      layoutY - the y-coordinate position of the polygon layout
      points - the points of the polygon as a varargs of doubles representing x,y coordinates alternately
      Returns:
      a Polygon configured with the specified properties
      See Also:
      • Polygon
      • Color
      • StrokeType

    • drawExplosion

      public Group drawExplosion()
      Creates a Group representing a stylized explosion graphic.

      The explosion consists of multiple layered polygons and an ellipse with orange and yellow colors, designed to visually simulate an explosion effect, for a hit on a Cell.

      Returns:
      a Group containing the shapes that form the explosion graphic
      See Also:
      • Group
      • Polygon
      • Ellipse
      • Color

    • drawSkull

      public Group drawSkull()
      Creates a Group containing the 2D shapes that visually represent a skull.

      This graphic is used as a marker or symbol within the game UI for a sunken Ship The exact composition of the skull is constructed using JavaFX shapes grouped together.

      Returns:
      a Group containing the skull shapes
      See Also:
      • Group
      • Shape

    • drawBone

      public Group drawBone(double rotation)
      Creates a Group representing a bone shape, rotated by the specified angle.

      The bone graphic is constructed using JavaFX shapes and transformed according to the rotation parameter. This is used as a part of the skull.

      Parameters:
      rotation - the angle in degrees to rotate the bone shape
      Returns:
      a Group containing the rotated bone shape
      See Also:
      • Group
      • Shape
